---
name: Register Creation
about: Create a new register for extra-curricular sessions
---

## Feature: Register Creation

- Allow users to create a register for an extra-curricular session
- Register should include date, session, year group, subject, and class
- Prevent duplicate registers for the same session

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- UI for selecting date, session, year group, subject, and class
- Register is saved in the database
- Duplicate check implemented
